title: Tootleoo Two
description: The Tale of Mister Tootleoo was first published in 1925 and Tootleoo Two in 1927. Then this 2 in one volume was published in 1932. Each page of text is illustrated with a charming full page black and white drawing. Though the illustrations were full color in the original books.Mr. Tootleoo is "A sailor jovial and brave/Who sailed upon the ocean wave." And who suffers a shipwreck but doesn't drown.
author: Bernard Darwin
